name: SweetBed
description: Girls invite you to their world. Play custom mode, become choreographer, chose girl, change her outfit, and the surrounding for the beautiful dancer. Join them and admire their beautiful movements in a dance. Sit comfortably in your armchair, put on VR googles and relax. 《SweetBed》是一款玩家可以选择不同的音乐来进行跳舞的轻度休闲舞蹈游戏。
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7/10 (64bit) Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: integrated graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7/10 (64bit) Processor: 2.2 GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 Ti or Radeon HD 7790 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
